info.title: Web Distribution Package Manager
info.description: It is responsible for creating the mapping file for distribution packages for web core.

prop.name: xmlParser
prop.description: The DOMParser object that edits the map file.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initialize the class and load the map file. The file will be created, if accidentally erased.

method.name: create

parameter.name: $libPackages
parameter.description: An array of all SDK library packages to include in the distribution. [library] => list(packageName).

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure or if the distribution name already exist.

method.name: update
method.description: Update a distribution with the given library packages and a new name.

parameter.name: $libPackages
parameter.description: An array of all SDK library packages to include in the distribution. [library] => list(packageName).

parameter.name: $newName
parameter.description: The new distribution name (optional). Leave empty not to change the name. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure or if the distribution doesn't exist.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove a given distribution from the distribution list.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getDistros
method.returndescription: An array of all distributions by name that include all library packages. [distrName] => list(libraries), where libraries => list(packageName).
